Game.Name: Get Ride! Amdriver - Senkou no Hero Tanjou! (Japan)
Game.plot: Get Ride! AMDriver: Senkou no Hero Tanjou is an Action game, developed by WinkySoft and published by Konami,which was released in Japan in 2004.Cheat: Unlocks special GearsAfter beating Mission 8, the Password Screen will be unlocked. You can find it in the Menu, right after beating a mission. It is the fourth option down, if you cannot read Japanese. If you unlock something, all the numbers/letters will reset to A.
